name: 鄭鴻斌
objective:
本門課主要簡介各項再生能源系統之原理與未來發展，內容包括以下﹕各種再生能源系統之應用與分析，燃料電池之應用與分析，生質能之應用，及新能源之應用效益分析。
This course is an introduction to the principles and future development of renewable system that includes the applications and analysis of different types of renewable energy, fuel cells, and bio-energy, analysis on the benefits of new energy applications.
